name: TrendStartr
tag_list: trends, social-network, social-media, mobile, android, iphone, tags, discover, be-discovered
overview:
A mobile & web social platform that allows users to Share. Discover. & Be Discovered in real time. An aggregation platform of all your existing networks to help you build a brand and become a TrendStarter. Every picture and video shared becomes a data point for someone to see the world through your eyes.

There are many social sharing platforms out there today, but few or none of the platforms are catered towards helping the actual users behind the content get discovered.

TrendStartr is a platform where people don’t have to follow the trends society wants them to, you can start a trend and see if you can get others to follow, or join a trend to start conversations with people who share the same interests as you around the world.

It’s Twitter visualized and Youtube socialized.
